summary.span: 定義型別的屬性。

span.span: Defines the properties for a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`PropertyBuilder`一律與相關聯`TypeBuilder`。A `PropertyBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. `TypeBuilder`。The `TypeBuilder`. `DefineProperty` 方法會傳回新`PropertyBuilder`給用戶端。`DefineProperty` method will return a new `PropertyBuilder` to a client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作中使用動態類型的屬性`PropertyBuilder`透過取得若要建立屬性架構和相關聯實作之屬性內的 IL 邏輯。The following code sample demonstrates how to implement properties in a dynamic type using a `PropertyBuilder` obtained via to create the property framework and an associated to implement the IL logic within the property. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: defaultValue

span.span: The default value of this property.

summary.span: 設定這個屬性的預設值。

span.span: Sets the default value of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 僅限於下列類型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. CLS 合規性的屬性型別是參考型別，如果需要`defaultValue`要`null`。If the property type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 不過，從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`對於參考型別，只要此值可以指派給該參考類型，可以為非 null。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for reference types as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以指派給屬性的型別。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a property of type . 這不符合 CLS 標準，但它可以是在 interop 的案例中很有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.
